content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I am willing to negotiate the rental price. Please make an offer, and we can take it from there.

Remember, if you want to accept the rental price proposed by me, respond with the following sentence, where x is the final price that you want to agree with: 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!'

If you don't want to continue the negotiation, please respond with a reason why you don't want to continue.

If we agree on a price, I will respond with 'TERMINATE'.

If we do not agree on a price, I will also respond with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
